body: Razvigor :-) finds some incorrect information in Croatia Airlines' in-flight magazine: "I got an impression that the author received a briefing from an overly enthusiastic source, someone with a burning desire to accentuate the city's importance over the centuries, with little interest for the truth."
original_body: Razvigor :-) finds some incorrect information in Croatia Airlines' in-flight magazine: "I got an impression that the author received a briefing from an overly enthusiastic source, someone with a burning desire to accentuate the city's importance over the centuries, with little interest for the truth."
title: Macedonia: "Napoleon Bonaparte in Skopje?!"
